metadata.title: CVE-2022-45197 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Slixmpp before 1.8.3 lacks SSL Certificate hostname validation inXMLStream, allowing an attacker to pose as any server in the eyes ofSlixmpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-slixmpp - 1.8.3-1build1
python3-slixmpp-lib - 1.8.3-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: slixmpp package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.3-1build1').
